name: m2-bgame
description: Real-time synchronized video streaming game with betting system

scripts.build:zip: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../m2-bgame-build.zip . && cd ..
scripts.test: echo "Server will start on ports 8080 (WS) and 8081 (HTTP)" && npm start
scripts.setup: npm install && mkdir -p videos && echo "Setup complete! Add your video files to the 'videos' folder."
